item.title: #en @ 1492544057905610755
item.description: Digital humanists who think this is simply a matter of pumping money-gas into a web site can keep on walking and get outta my replies. Infrastructure for linked open data is more than just money for a domain and a server, and acting like it isn't is just telling on yourselves.

item.title: #en @ 1492469872416198657
item.description: @bm_lod_status This IMHO is why cultural institutions are often better partnering with eg @wikimediauk than building their own open data infrastructure. The accessibility of key LOD nodes shouldn't be heir to the whims of staffing or policy.

i still believe in the invaluable benefits of a connected system of datasets describing real-world concepts and things.
